page.title: 18Views on Life Today
page.content: An invitation to comment on the {W.I. questionaire}sent to all the houses in{Shalford}produced these: "Living in an area of delightful countryside, it is worth noting that very few people appear to view and enjoy it 'au pied'. Most people seem to drive even the shortest of distances. It might be reasonable to observe therefore, some rural areas are in danger of becoming 'dormitory villages'. However,in this area there are many groups and organisations, run and supported by local residents which clearly helps to guard against that situation developing to its most extreme." "I think we need a machine to buy time! There are so many opportunities open especially to teen-agers who seem to fill every moment of their waking time."
